title: If your main was a 1980s cartoon Villain what would their ultimate evil plan look like?
body:
http://i.imgur.com/eALdJMz.png


You Veigar mains must have thought about this before, I mean Veigar is basically a 1980s cartoon villain.

{{champion:92}}: MWHAHAHAHAHAHAH!! This plan is perfect Under the cover of darkness I will enter Demacian and steal all of their chocolate, and while those foolish guardsmen are busy looking for all of the choclate that I have stolen and tucked away in a secret place they will never think of looking I will enter the castle and kidnap the dragon princess ({{champion:102}} duh) and she will be mine forever!!!

{{champion:103}}: Why would you laugh at the start of your plan revel? 

{{champion:92}}: Wh-whats wrong with that!?

{{champion:103}}: Well I mean it just seems to take out all of the suspense that's all.

{{champion:92}}: Bah!

{{champion:103}}: And if that secret place is Lux's bedroom you may want to get a new one.

{{champion:92}}: F-Fool! Of coarse it's not her room! Any fool would know to check there first! *Note to self find new secret place of secretness >.>*

replies.body:
MF discussing her plans to abduct the tech to make all women so busty they're guaranteed back pain.

{{champion:21}} So we go in guns blazing and do what we need to do.
{{champion:51}} That's not much of a plan.
{{champion:254}} I don't care, I like it.
{{champion:21}} I always shoot first.
{{champion:254}} Do you ask questions while shooting?
{{champion:21}} No, they're usually dead and everyone else who is alive has their ears ringing.
{{champion:51}} How did I get dragged into this again?
{{champion:222}} FLAT IS JUSTICE!
{{champion:21}} That's why.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/284/922/0e3.png
I would hope you enjoyed how I threw Jinx in there.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

{{champion:37}} 

1) Make a giant ass speaker

2) Climb to mount everest

3) Play music on said speaker and Control the world via Music

4) Idk, Profit?

I have no clue why she'd do this anyways. Probably for Shits & Giggles.

Adorable.

And before I forget can I say that Chibi Cinder is freaking adorable

https://www.justrivals.com/s3/justrivals-webassets/rivals/a8d3b19c93af4936be5d6267ff501a08.png

Yes... 

but its Cinder... 

But Cinder is also Jessica Nigri...

But its still Cinder...

Thus Cinder is Cinder and i hate her... >.>

######but yes she kinda is adorable
I hate Cinder too, but Chibi Cinder would make a great 1980s villain
Lol yah, especially the way she is portrayed in Chibi
It was the best episode, Mercury can still go fk himself though. Kitten Killer 9000 >.> bastard

Ikr... but Zwei in the end will stop them!

http://i.imgur.com/ekelbzp.png?noredirect
yup

I mean it would be hard not to be defeated by zwei, hes so adorable

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/rwby/images/0/08/Zwei_Chibi.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20160422203706

even blake cant resist how cute he is!

http://orig15.deviantart.net/6194/f/2016/219/8/5/rwby_chibi_episode_14_meme__by_wcher999-dacyj31.jpg

> [{quoted}](name=MavenSong,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=aOsYEi2r,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-12T07:06:27.728+0000)
>

>

> 
> 2) Climb to mount everest
> 
> 3) ~~Play music on said speaker and Control the world via Music~~** play Magen Taylor's "all about that bass". **
> 
> 4) Idk, profit?
> 
> I have no clue why she'd do this anyways. Probably for Shits & Giggles.

Now **that's** some evil shit

{{champion:161}} : Steal all the library books, learn everything!
http://i.imgur.com/JZwsp4N.gif

Do this to every kid's lunch.
http://65.media.tumblr.com/2627a94acc3b67b4c75f23bb25e7f179/tumblr_nwqi2nVe2t1tof9kfo1_500.png
{{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

Taric:  The great Ezreal panty heist of 1985.  

I would proceed to tell a long story but it is past midnight and Riot removes 18+ stuff from the boards.  Suffice to say Taric went past panties and stole Ezreal's sapphire.  

I applaud those who know old Taric's lines well enough to get the joke.
It's obvious Taric was making good use of Ruby that entire time.
https://i.imgur.com/UXbTMTt.jpg?noredirect
You would have to know some of Taric's VO lines prior to the rework to get the joke.

no, i know... but the image in the thread is from RWBY and the character in the Image i posted is named Ruby.... *sigh* i give up  explaining... i dont want Yang to be pissed

http://img14.deviantart.net/96f1/i/2015/341/1/1/5_by_lightning_in_my_hand-d9jenmc.png

... I wasn't knowledgeable about RWBY, so that means I was the wrong audience for your joke...

Did you at least like my original post in this thread with MF's plan?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

{{champion:268}} "Soon... the mind control toxin will be spread through the sands of kitty litter around the world by my potent magic! There will no longer be any catfolk to topple the greatest empire to have ever lived! Say goodbye to your precious feline friends, Nidalee! The birds shall take to the skies and rule this world once more!"
Sad there was no deep fryer Azir skin.  Or deep fried...

{{champion:17}} Alright, I have no idea where am I going with this, but I was asked to act mean, so how about we just steal a train filled with chocolate?

{{champion:85}} That's the stupidest thing I have ever...

{{champion:150}} CHOCOLAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAATE!!! *Bashes out of the room, making a hole.*

{{champion:17}} ...

{{champion:85}} ...

{{champion:45}} Captain underpants, how about you leave the evil plants for the TRUE evil yordle?

{{champion:17}} Fair enough.

2 things:

1) Pretty sure Teemo is the most evil.

2) Anyone else think yordles are like dogs and chocolate is harmful to them?  That would def make Teemo the most evil and explain the lollipoppy skin of death.

So cute to believe those lies...

Anyways, Teemo isn't evil and yordles are not dogs, don't be racist against them.

{{champion:62}} : My plan is foolproof minion. No one will stop my diabolical plan to destroy all the major factions. MUAHAHAHA! 

http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/BlueMoonWolf_small_zpsnsjj9kxv.png : So what's your plan?

{{champion:62}} : I will make my staff grow so big, that it will CRUSH the major cities with it's sheer weight. It's GENIUS! 

http://i1042.photobucket.com/albums/b430/bluemoonwolf8/BlueMoonWolf_small_zpsnsjj9kxv.png : ... Were you watching Lalala Demacia?

{{champion:62}}: NO.... _Maybe_ >.>

{{champion:254}} I'm going to punch people. HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA.

{{champion:254}} ... Yeah...

{{champion:254}} I'm getting Fired aren't I
{{champion:78}} Find the hero and take over the wooorld wehehe
{{champion:202}} : I dont know what where doing but were doing it four times...

{{champion:62}} : Once I've perfected the ultimate technique, I will use it to lay waste to my master and all of my rivals so that I alone remain as the single greatest fighter in all of existence!

{{champion:238}} : Ummm....that's kind of my thing.

{{champion:62}} : Shut up, Shredder, go fight a turtle or something.

{{champion:238}} : What did you call me?! And why would I fight a turtle?

{{champion:33}} : ...

{{champion:122}} I will create a giant basketball orbiting the earth to dunk the ocean, which coincidentally has a giant hoop already built for reentry! After the seas are all washed up, I will finally get that cursed Super Galaxy {{champion:105}} and his secret underwater base!
{{champion:117}} All the cupcakes in the world shall be mine!
